alert.note: Alert for Kit Carson County; Yuma County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 2:08PM MDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Yuma and north central Kit Carson Counties through 245 PM MDT... At 208 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles south of Cope, or 20 miles north of Seibert, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Yuma and north central Kit Carson Counties, including the following locations... Joes and Kirk. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Goodland.
